title: Operation Revenge
description: When Haley catches her boyfriend, Chad, cheating on her, she is devastated. Wanting revenge, she turns to his best friend, Simon for help. Tired of watching his friend mistreat women Simon is all too happy to help. They come up with a plan . . . pretend to be a couple to get at Chad. What will happen when their plan backfires and they find themselves falling for each other?
author: Kate  Hopkins
